about_the_game:
Escape the angel's dream
Lead Evan and Aviary out of the angel's dream in this Action RPG. Equip yourselves and be prepared to venture into unknown territories teeming with monsters, gaining experience and new Mantras in your path to learn the truth of the angel's dream.

Flick Combat
Enter encounters where you must control both Evan and Aviary in Action-RTS style combat. Shift yourself between the two, and weave a flurry of decisive blows against your foes.

Hone your Mantras
Take on Soul Dream's customisation system with over 40 mantras to discover and equip, and 12 unique classes that dictate how you build your characters.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+) and Windows 10, 64-bit versions only.
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-8250U CPU @ 1.60GHz 1.80 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10

short_description: Evan and Aviary have been cast into the dream of an angel, where unknown forces prevent them from returning to their reality. Confronted by two mysterious figures and assailed by monsters, Evan and Aviary must fight and determine the truth of the angel's dream
